Articles.Content:
So I gots me one of those fandangled 3d TV's and I got the brilliant idea of trying to play KSP in the artificial 3D mode.

Just WOW ... If you have one you gotta try it

3D TVs are sooo 2013 lol!

Just kidding of course. :-)

Does KSP support Oculus VR?

[quote name='LostOblivion']
Does KSP support Oculus VR?[/QUOTE]

I haven't the foggiest ... All I know is that playing KSP in 3D adds a whole new dimension to gameplay (pun intended)
If you have a pair of red/cyan glasses you can play it in real 3d using iz3d.. Only problem is that in KSP the ground terrain is for some reason not in 3d.
Nvidia 3dvision works with KSP too, even in red/blue mode. There are issues with shadows and such, though, unfortunately. A stock anaglyph mode would be pretty neat!
